text: 4|131|Akasamandalata yi ache arau prthiraita yi ache se'i sakalo allaharae'i, tomalokara purbe yisakalaka kitaba diya haichila sihamtaka arau tomalokako nirdesa dicho ye, tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa. Arau yadi tomaloke kupharai karaa tathapi'o akasamandalata yi ache arau prthiraita yi ache se'i sakalo allaharae'i, allaha abharamukta, prasansita.
